name: The Thief (VelocityGames)
description:
Game created for Mini Game Jam!

You are a filthy thief and you know what you want. GOLD! 

So just go and take it from a box,right? NO!

Beware the team of 6 specialized guards who will chase you and if they see you with their flashlights,they will stop you (without violence,they will just find you, tell you "please leave" and you as a respectful person will leave) from stealing their gold.

Pro tip: Pick up the watermelons to get a temporary speed boost
